thread.title: Newark Schools' Journey to Local Control Begins
thread.title_full: Newark Schools' Journey to Local Control Begins

title: Newark Schools' Journey to Local Control Begins
text:
09 Newark Schools' Journey to Local Control Begins 
Education Week: Christopher Cerf chatted with parents and took photos in his first school board meeting since being tapped as superintendent for the long-troubled district here, but questions remain as to whether he will swiftly and ably steer the city's public schools back to local control after 20 years under state authority.
